description: Built-in primitive and container types in the Kairo programming language

primitive_types.name: string
primitive_types.description: Represents a string type, compatible with std::wstring in C++

primitive_types.name: char
primitive_types.description: Represents a character type directly compatible with wchar_t in C++

primitive_types.name: usize
primitive_types.description: Represents an unsigned size type, equivalent to size_t in C++

primitive_types.name: isize
primitive_types.description: Represents a signed size type, equivalent to ssize_t in C++

primitive_types.name: void
primitive_types.description: Represents a void type, equivalent to void in C++

primitive_types.name: bool
primitive_types.description: Represents a boolean type, equivalent to bool in C++

primitive_types.name: null
primitive_types.description: A static instance of kairo::std::null_t type, used for null values

container_types.name: list<T>
container_types.description: Represents a doubly linked list type
